tool_description: Send free Whatsapp message from your mobile number directly from your website or app.
name: WhatsSpot
title: WhatsSpot

api_list.name: List Message
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsspot.p.rapidapi.com/message/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsspot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
